concept.title: Replicating Streams
concept.shortdesc: When you connect a stage to multiple stages, the stage passes all data to all connected stages. You can configure the logic for connected stages to discard different records, as with Required Fields, but by default all records are passed.

conbody.p: pipelinesreplicating streamsreplicatingstreams in a pipelineUse a Stream Selector to use conditions to route different sets of data to different streams.
